page.title: 19Playtime in 1985
page.content: At 10:30 it is playtime.Some people rush out to make the most of their playtime; others like to stay in to read Beano and other comics.The older boys usually play football but some of the third year boys build dens in the woodland area.The girls play tick or elastics or a skipping game such as -"Raspberry apple jam tart-tell me the name of your sweet heart-A.B.C.D...." When it is a wet playtime we have to stay in and read or draw.In summer we all have to go out unless you have hayfever.In winter when there's snow on the ground,we all have fun throwing snowballs,making snowmen and making skiddy patches.When playtime ends our teacher blows a whistle.We all stand still and then we are sent in class by class.We have to walk in quietly and then we get on with our work.
